name: alexa-suggest-movie
description: The Alexa Skills that will suggest movies based on your mood

scripts.build: npm i && rm -rf dist/ 2> /dev/null && mkdir dist && zip -9 -r dist/alexa-suggest-movie.zip package.json node_modules/ && cd src && zip -9 -r ../dist/alexa-suggest-movie.zip * && cd ..
scripts.ziptest: npm run build && cd dist && unzip alexa-suggest-movie.zip && ../node_modules/.bin/mocha ../src/.mocha.js '**/*.test.js' && cd ../ && rm -rf dist

author: DiUS Computing PTY
